item.title: Representability, Coproducts, and Reflective Subcategories
item.description: Write-ups of interesting problems from Riehl's Category Theory in Context, sections 4.5 and 4.6.

item.title: A Simple Language With Flow Typing
item.description: We discuss a simple language and type system that provides for flow typing with records and union types. We also present an extension that generalizes to near-arbitrary narrowing of types at the expense of greater runtime costs.

item.title: The Commodification of Masculinity in Hip-Hop
item.description: New-age hybrid masculinities displayed by hip-hop artists are more a consequence of growing brand influence, rather than a shift towards progressivism.

item.title: Hot Code Reloading, with libc or in the browser
item.description: A small framework for writing programs with support for hot code reloading. Discusses runtimes that execute machine code or JavaScript in the browser.

item.title: Pattern Matching With a Typechecker
item.description: Solving problems without leaving the TypeScript type system.

item.title: Impact vs Innovation & Industry vs Academia
item.description: In popular industry, I often see discontinuities between 'impactful' and 'innovative' work. I describe how these discontinuities arise, and what we can do about them.

item.title: Heterogeneity in Volunteering
item.description: Some notes on differing motivations for volunteering and social impact.

item.title: Scaling Up
item.description: We need to think about how to scale up effectively.
